con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import com.eviware.soapui.SoapUI
def log = SoapUI.log def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
log.info json
assert json.code == 200
def pattern = ~/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-4[a-f0-9]{3}-[89aAbB][a-f0-9]{3}-[a-f0-9]{12}/ assert pattern.matcher(json.data).matches()

log.info json
assert json.code == 200
def pattern = ~/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-4[a-f0-9]{3}-[89aAbB][a-f0-9]{3}-[a-f0-9]{12}/ assert pattern.matcher(json.data).matches()

log.info json
assert json.code == 200

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import com.eviware.soapui.SoapUI
def log = SoapUI.log def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
log.info json
assert json.code != 200 assert json.code == 1001

//http://www.soapui.org/Scripting-Properties/tips-a-tricks.html#1-accessing-properties-settings-and-names
//import com.eviware.soapui.SoapUI //def log = SoapUI.log
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
def testCaseProperty = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("companyID") //log.info json.data.id
assert json.code == 200
assert json.data.id == testCaseProperty assert json.data.city == 'DibblerCity' assert json.data.country == 'DibblerCountry' assert json.data.followerClaim == 'Dibbler claim' assert json.data.name == 'Dibbler' assert json.data.orgNr == 'DIBBLERORG' assert json.data.postalCode == 12345 assert json.data.state == 'DibblerState' assert json.data.street == 'DibblerStreet' assert json.data.streetNr == '45'
assert json.data.location.latitude == 2.2 assert json.data.location.longitude == 1.1

//http://www.soapui.org/Scripting-Properties/tips-a-tricks.html#1-accessing-properties-settings-and-names
//import com.eviware.soapui.SoapUI //def log = SoapUI.log
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
def testCaseProperty = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.getPropertyValue("companyID") //log.info json.data.id
assert json.code == 200
assert json.data.id == testCaseProperty assert json.data.city == 'DibblerCity_UPDATED' assert json.data.country == 'DibblerCountry_UPDATED' assert json.data.followerClaim == 'Dibbler claim_UPDATED' assert json.data.name == 'Dibbler_UPDATED' assert json.data.orgNr == 'DIBBLERORG_UPDATED' assert json.data.postalCode == 123456 assert json.data.state == 'DibblerState_UPDATED' assert json.data.street == 'DibblerStreet_UPDATED' assert json.data.streetNr == '456'
assert json.data.location.latitude == 4.4 assert json.data.location.longitude == 3.3
